title:
I saw a post on here today asking about the previous morning show host on 102.7 WGNI, and I knew he had gone over to another radio station, but here\'s my question:



Where is the new host, Carter, from?



He\'s so funny with Kitty.  We all liked Craig Thompson here in the office, but we still listen to WGNI in the morning because Carter is just so peppy, and you need that when you wake up! (lol)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.wgni.com/default.asp?pid=24528
